Name: Small amulet in the form of a stela
Description: This amulet in the form of a stela, which was acquired in the art trade, represents three pairs of ears which are found on both sides of the name of the woman Nefertari. The ears show that the dedicant, whose name is not specified, hopes that the divinity, probably Ahmes-Nefertari, queen at the beginning of the 18th Dynasty, will pay attention to her prayers.
